## Introduction

My name is J Steven Raquel. I'm an undergraduate at the University of California, Santa Barbara pursuing a degree in Statistical Science with a concentration in Applied Statistics, set to graduate in spring 2018. 

<br>

## Coding

My primary language is R. I have extensive experience cleaning data, as well as some in analysis and visualization, although I am always trying to expand on this.

<br>

## Hobbies

In my free time, I am an avid gamer. I also have a weekly college radio show called The Company of Lazarus on 91.9 KCSB-FM.
